constituent: the following, feathers, wings, vase, stand up
heisigStory: Feathers . . . vase. Be sure to contrast the connotation of this keyword with that for next (Frame 510).
koohiiStory1: The following segment is sponsored by...Swiffer - who make excellent feather dusters for cleaning your vases.
koohiiStory2: Your feathers would also stand up if you were a hen in a slaughter house and you heard: "The following!".
myStory: theo sau. kế tiếp.. lông đứng.
